sentences.en: A young man sidled up to me and said, "May I help you?"
sentences.cn: 一个年轻人悄悄地走向我，并说道：“我可以帮你吗？”

sentences.en: He can not sidle away from personal responsibility.
sentences.cn: 他不能逃避个人的责任.

sentences.en: If you sit at the back you can sidle out without anyone seeing you leave.
sentences.cn: 假如你坐在后面你可以溜出去而没人看见.

sentences.en: Sara Sidle: What do you think caused these marks?
sentences.cn: 莎拉·西德勒: 你认为是什么导致了这些痕迹?

sentences.en: Standard configuration is sidle frequency conversion motor drive & dec optional configuration is servo motor drive.
sentences.cn: 标准配置横行变频马达驱动,可选购横行伺服马达驱动.

sentences.en: The young man began to sidle near the pretty girl sitting on the log.
sentences.cn: 这个年轻人开始贴近那个坐在原木上的漂亮女孩.

trans.tran_cn: 横着走, 悄悄贴近, 侧身而行
trans.tran_en: If you sidle somewhere, you walk there in a quiet or cautious way, as if you do not want anyone to notice you
